ABOUT_1: where anyone can earn rewards for their content!
ABOUT_2: is social application where you get paid for blogging, commenting and curating.
ABOUT_3: and it is an open-source, community-driven mobile project. It offers content access for reading, commenting, voting, posting, transfer earnings, etc. features offered by {{platformname}} blockchain and {{sitename}}.
ABOUT_4: 1. The eSteem app never accesses or holds onto any user funds.
ABOUT_5: 2. The app offers a client-side security model, which means that your private keys are hosted locally and are never sent to any servers.
ABOUT_6: 3. eSteem also offers a simple, attractive interface with a seamless user experience.
ABOUT_7: 4. The app will never require users to input any personal information.
POST_1: Swipe left on comments to see options
POST_2: Tap on comments to see sub-comments
PROFILE_1: {{platformname}} are tradeable tokens, which may be transferred anytime. {{platformname}} can be converted to {{platformpower}} in a process called powering up.
PROFILE_2: {{platformpower}} are influence tokens that earn more power for holding long term and voting on posts. The more Steem Power one holds, the more one can influence other’s rewards and earn rewards for accurate voting.
PROFILE_4: The estimated value is based on a 7-day average value of {{platformname}}.
PROFILE_5: The posting key is used for posting and voting. It should be different from the active and owner keys.
PROFILE_6: The owner key is the master key for the account and is required to change the other keys. The private key or password for the owner key should be kept offline as much as possible.
PROFILE_7: The active key is used to make transfers and place orders in the internal market.
PROFILE_8: The memo key is used to create and read memos.
PIN_TEXT:
Pin code helps to secure the eSteem app and your data.

Note: Once enabled, you have a maximum of 4 attempts. If you forget your pin or fail to login, the app will remove the logged in user data. You can then re-login and continue using the app.
VOTE_TEXT:
You will get a notification when someone votes on your content!
Note: Notifications include voting weight, as well as an alert message (be it up-vote, down-vote or un-vote).
COMMENT_TEXT:
You will get a notification when someone comments on your posts or comments!
Note: Notifications include when someone edits their comments as well.
FOLLOW_TEXT: You will get a notification when someone Follows or Unfollows you!
MENTIONS_TEXT: You will get a notification when someone mentions you in their post or comment!
RESTEEM_TEXT: You will get a notification when someone re-blogs your post!
VOTING_TEXT:
Vote weight or percentage affects voting power on the app. This allows you to regulate your voting reward.

Note: This will change voting weight/percentage for down-voting everywhere on the app.
LOGIN_1: Sign in with your username and password to continue.
LOGIN_2: Posting key is used for posting, commenting, voting and following.
LOGIN_3: Active key is used for transfers and updating profile pictures.
LOGIN_4: User credentials are kept locally on the device. Credentials are removed upon logout!
TITLE: Title
REBLOG_TEXT: Re-blogging is irreversible. Do you want to continue?
LOGIN_FAIL: Login failed! Please make sure you have logged in with your master password or provided posting private key, if you have chosen Advanced Mode.
LOGIN_FAIL_A: Login failed! Please make sure you have logged in with your master password or provided active private key, if you have chosen Advanced Mode.
DIRECT_LINK_PICTURE: Direct web link for the picture
PASSWORD_INCORRECT: The password or account name was incorrect
QR_TEXT: Place a QR code inside the scanning area
BALANCE_TEXT: Make sure you have enough balance for the transaction!
NONEXIST_USER: The user whom you are trying to transfer funds to does not exist!
TRANSFER_TEXT: Are you sure you want to transfer?
FLAGGING_TEXT:
Flagging a post can remove rewards and make this material less visible.

The flag should be used for the following:
  • Fraud or Plagiarism
  • Hate Speech or Internet Trolling
  • Intentional miscategorisation of content or Spam
REQUEST_LIMIT_TEXT: Request limit reached. Check out other trend/tags!
ACTIVE_KEY_REQUIRED_TEXT: Please provide your Active private key, if you have chosen Advanced login mode!
RESET_PICTURE_TEXT: This will reset user profile picture
RESET_COVER_PICTURE_TEXT: This will reset user cover picture
LANGUAGES_TEXT: You can change the language of the app here.
LOGIN_TO_X: This operation requires the user to be logged in with main password and active/posting key. Please login and try again.
NO_IMAGE: You have not uploaded an image yet!
CHAIN_TEXT: You can change blockchain or default platform here.
CURRENCY_TEXT: You can change your default currency here. You will see the post/comment reward value in this currency.
ABOUT_11:
Feature list
- Access unique articles on any subject that you are interested in.
- Engage with authors by discussing topics through comments.
- Voting for posts rewards authors, as well as earning curation rewards.
- Publish your articles, blog posts and host them for free and earn rewards by engaging and gaining followers.
- Write articles on the go and save multiple drafts of posts for later publication.
- Bookmark your favorite articles to read later.
- Exchange or withdraw your earnings.
- Send your funds to any authors, users, friends or followers, etc.
- Follow interesting authors and bloggers.
- Search the followers and authors you are following.
- Get notifications to stay in touch with your followers and discussions that you are involved in.
- Search for interesting tags/categories of articles and authors.
- Personalise your profile.
- Many more features to come.

Security
1. The eSteem app never accesses or holds onto user funds.
2. The app offers a client-side security model with private keys hosted locally, which are never sent to any servers. You are responsible for backing up any passwords.
3. The app offers a simple, attractive interface with a seamless user experience.
4. eSteem offers an extra layer of security with a pin-code

eSteem supports Steem and Golos platforms.
NSFW_TEXT: In order to view NSFW/Adult content, you should be 18+ years of age! This setting enables the automatic display of NSFW images and text.
AUTO_DOWNLOAD_TEXT: The fetch images setting allows you to save bandwidth by allowing you to disable external images from loading, giving you complete control over your traffic usage.
HIDDEN_TEXT: This post was hidden due to low ratings
